document.full_text: a dispute has flared up in the case of a murdered 9-year-old girl in pennsylvania over whether the suspect should have been arrested in regard to an earlier incident involving the victim, officials and family members said on friday.
document.title: questions over earlier incident raised in girl's murder
lines_and_colors: a dispute has flared up in the case of a murdered 9-year-old girl in pennsylvania over whether the suspect should have been arrested in regard to an earlier incident involving the victim, officials and family members said on friday.
